sentences: To conclude, progress on all these fronts - and, more generally, toward a deeper European integration - can be achieved only if we overcome the mutual distrust and prejudice among member countries that have developed in recent years.

In doing this, we should strive to give sound and fair application to the principles underpinning the new European rules, preserving the value of banking activity, to the benefit of savers and borrower households and firms.
